Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><IIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIII><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Start Workflow</INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE><INP_LOG_SEVERITY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">INFO</INP_LOG_SEVERITY><IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII><INP_CREATE_REPLICATION_SET class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_CREATE_REPLICATION_SET><INP_REPLICATION_SET_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_REPLICATION_SET_NAME><INP_DATA_AGENT class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">Q_FILE_REPLICATION</INP_DATA_AGENT><INP_DESTINATION_HOST class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName></clientName><clientId /></INP_DESTINATION_HOST><INP_ALLOOW_RECOVERY_POINT class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">yes</INP_ALLOOW_RECOVERY_POINT><INP_COMMON_BASE_FOLDER class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_COMMON_BASE_FOLDER><INP_USE_COMMON_BASE_FOLDER class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">yes</INP_USE_COMMON_BASE_FOLDER><INP_CREATE_REPLICATION_PAIR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_CREATE_REPLICATION_PAIR><IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII><INP_SOURCE_PATH class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"></INP_SOURCE_PATH><INP_PAUSE_WF_CREATE_REPSET class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_CREATE_REPSET><INP_PAUSE_WF_CREATE_REPPAIR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_CREATE_REPPAIR><INP_REP_SOURCE_CLIENT class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName></clientName><clientId /></INP_REP_SOURCE_CLIENT></inputs>

inputs.val: <inputs><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_STATUS}</INP_STATUS><INP_JOBID class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId}</INP_JOBID><INP_WORKFLOW_NAME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/workflow/workflowName}</INP_WORKFLOW_NAME><INP_START_TIME class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/system/startTime}</INP_START_TIME><INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE}</INP_FAILIURE_MESSAGE></inputs>

Activity.description: creates a super process group
Activity.name: ProcessBlock

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="if (xpath:{/workflow/ReplicationSet_1/commandOutput}.contains("Created repset successfully.") && xpath:{/workflow/ReplicationSet_1/exitCode} == 0 && xpath:{/workflow/ReplicationSet_2/commandOutput}.contains(xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_9/pb_repset_name}))
{
 return true;
}
else
{
 return false;
} 

" /></inputs>
